raw_comment: I'll focus just on why the vast majority of countries lie above the 45-degree line.  For *some* of these countries, tne reason for that might be that it's a reflection of the fact that older people are feeling left behind with respect to the newer, more technologically sophisticated world.  Having been "born digital," young people don't fear technology to the extent that older people do.
ace_sentences: I focus on the reason why the vast majority of countries lie above the 45-degree line.
For some of these countries, this fact may reflect a feeling of older people.
Older people may feel left behind with respect to a newer and more technologically sophisticated world.
Young people fear technology less than older people fear technology.
